description: This lusciously green chicken salad with an easy-to-make pickled cucumber heroes fresh spring produce and is ready in 30 minutes. Learn how to make this easy salad recipe thatâ€™s perfect for lunch or dinner.
name: Spring Greens And Sesame-Crusted Chicken Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup tamari soy sauce wheat free

recipeInstructions.text: To make the pickled cucumber, combine vinegar and sugar in a bowl, stirring until sugar dissolves. Add Qukes and toss to combine. Set aside.

Meanwhile, sprinkle half the seeds on a sheet of baking paper. Place 1 chicken breast on top and turn to coat lightly. Cover with a second sheet of baking paper. Using a rolling pin, pound chicken until 2cm thick. Repeat with remaining seeds and chicken. Heat peanut oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Add chicken and cook for 4 minutes on each side or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate. Cover with foil. Rest for 5 minutes. Slice.
Combine soy, sesame oil, ginger and garlic in a bowl. Place edamame in a bowl, cover with boiling water and stand for 3 minutes or until tender. Drain, then refresh under cold water.
Drain cucumber mixture, discarding liquid. Divide spinach, avocado, radish, edamame, peas, pickled cucumber, chicken, onion and coriander among bowls. Serve with soy dressing.
